data.title: The Press – Five on Vine
data.text:
By Brandon Wuske - March 2024

Cincinnati's Best New Restaurants 2024

#1 Five on Vine - A fresh take on American comfort food in an elegant space.Cincinnati Magazine's 22nd Best Restaurants issue is offering up a fresh twist on the classic culinary review by breaking down the city's best NEW restaurants.

Best new restaurants of 2023 in Cincinnati

It was another exciting year for the Greater Cincinnati dining scene. Along with some ambitious high-end restaurants, we saw the openings of a lively Italian cafe in Mount Lookout, a chef-driven taqueria in Terrace Park and an intimate tapas spot in Ludlow.
